- - -

Swedish Rock King Jerry Williams ( Sven Erik FernstrÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¶m) has sustained his career for close to 50 years, stubbornly refusing to compromise with the passing trends in music.

He had his first hits in 1962 with Darling Nelly Grey and Twistin' Patricia. With those two singles under his belt, he was booked at the Star Club in Hamburg where he performed together with The Beatles! When the Fab Four made their tour of Sweden in 1963, Jerry Williams & the Violents were chosen as their supporting act.

This Out of Print 3-CD collection features tracks from 1962 to 1991. Jerry moves from Rock n Roll, through Twist and Pop, a little flirt with Soul, towards more top-list oriented music in the 80's and 90's.
